scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development|| set NODE_ENV=development&& nodemon index.js
scripts.dev:db:migrate: export NODE_ENV=development|| set NODE_ENV=development&& npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.staging: export NODE_ENV=staging|| set NODE_ENV=staging&& nodemon index.js
scripts.production: export NODE_ENV=production|| set NODE_ENV=production&& nodemon index.js
